name: Easy Blue Print Symbol Library
summary: Learn about .BPZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can import and export custom symbol libraries in Easy Blue Print by selecting the Symbols & Stairs tab in the ribbon. To create a BPZ file, click the New Library button. You can then click the New Symbol button to add symbols to the new library. To load an existing symbol library, simply click the Import button and select a BPZ file.

description: Collection of objects or "symbols" used by Easy Blue Print, a floor plan design application; contains a set of related images that can be loaded into the program.
